name: SuperHero Street Fighter Games
description:
A new SuperHero Street Fighter has entered the arena!

Let's start a Superhero Street fighting! Beat all opponents to be a champion of street fighter. It's a time to show off your martial art tricks. Build up your powerful team to prove your fighting skills!

Prepare for the epic powerful fighting challenge! Assemble a criminal team & begin your quest to become the Ultimate SuperHero Champion!

FIGHT AS A STREET FIGHTER
You are true Street fighter. Feel the power in your hands to become a real street fighter. Choose your favorite character and compete in the street fighting game. Do not let your opponent reach you! Pull them out and be a perfect warrior.

DANGEROUS SUPERHEROES WARRIORS
Take control powerful superheroes warriors and test your fighting skills against most dangerous players from all around the world. Stay alive to kill the city fighter. Let's start download "SuperHero Street Fighter Games" to start fighting today!

FEATURES:
- Powerful superhero fighting game
- Very Addictive gameplay to feel like a real fighter
- Upgrade your characters and beat your competition
- Become perfect street boxer in kickboxing
- Build up a powerful team to win the competition
- Ultimate 3D stunt environment
- New Champions are being added to fighting all the time

This game makes you have a strong sense of combat. Showing a true spirit of Punches and Kicks. Win as Superhero Street Fighter.

Leave a review and let us know what you think about this fun game. We will use feedback In our upcoming updates!

If you have any queries feel free to ask! Thanks for playing
